name: Gillian R. Punzal
bio: Passionate about building scalable web applications with modern technologies.

name: Heidilyn L. Caling
role: UI/UX Designer, QA Tester and Content Manager
bio: A passionate member of DevSquad with experience in UI/UX design, basic Python programming, and quality assurance testing. Dedicated to creating user-friendly interfaces, ensuring software quality, and continuously learning to enhance both design and coding skills.

name: Eunice Q. Reyes
role: Documentation Lead, QA Tester and Content Manager
bio: A beginner programmer who is open to exploring new platforms and languages, and has an interest in developing simple games and creating websites tailored to personal interests.

name: Iza Marie C. Tomacruz
bio: An aspiring software developer with interests in technology, programming, and embedded systems, and has practical experience with Python, HTML, CSS, and GitHub. Aims to strengthen skills in hardware and software development through academic and hands-on projects.

name: Rasmine J. Blas
role: Documentation Lead, QA Tester and Content Manager
bio: A Computer Engineering student with a strong foundation in coding and a deep passion for technology, who is committed to further developing her technical skills and applying knowledge to create efficient and innovative solutions in the field of computing.

name: Leonard Mark D. Galivo
bio: Just another programmer who talks to his computer more than people, and somehow, it listens.

name: Chariz Kyle A. Santos
bio: Lead UI/UX Designer and Front-End Developer, responsible for creating easy-to-use and attractive interfaces while making sure the website runs smoothly. With a keen eye for design, Chariz bridges creativity and functionality to bring the team's ideas to life on the web.

name: Erika Mae I. Villamin
bio: A motivated student who loves coding, making creative web projects, and learning new technologies
